meta.title: About - Eye On Idea
meta.description: Learn about Eye On Idea, a Danish digital consultancy founded by Rune M. P. Pjetursson. We help B2B companies build a clear and professional digital presence across Europe.

hero.title: Building Digital Foundations That Last
hero.subtitle: Eye On Idea is a Danish digital consultancy that helps B2B companies build a strong and professional online presence.

story.title: From Idea to Reality
paragraphs: Eye On Idea was founded in 2025 with a simple belief. Every business deserves a digital presence that reflects who they are and what they offer.
Many companies end up with websites that do not fit their business, are difficult to update, or become expensive to maintain over time.
We take a different approach. Every project starts with understanding your goals and your situation. We build a solid digital foundation that supports your growth today and in the future.

founder.name: Rune M. P. Pjetursson
bio: Rune founded Eye On Idea to connect technical expertise with real business needs. His focus is always on results, clarity, and long-term value.
He has worked with companies across Europe and understands how to translate complex ideas into practical and reliable digital solutions.

philosophy.title: Working Philosophy
philosophy.text: I believe in long-term partnerships, not one-time projects. When you work with Eye On Idea, you gain a partner who understands your business and works to support your success.

items.title: Clarity
items.description: We build solutions that you understand and can manage. Clear structure leads to better results.

items.title: Partnership
items.description: We stay involved beyond delivery. Your success is part of our responsibility.

items.title: Honest Communication
items.description: We give clear advice and realistic expectations so you can make informed decisions.

items.title: Quality
items.description: We focus on durability, performance, and professional standards in every project.

location.title: Based in Denmark, Serving Europe
location.description: Eye On Idea is based in Aalborg, Denmark. We work with clients across the Nordic region and the European Union. Meetings can be held online or in person when needed.

cta.title: Let Us Talk About Your Project
cta.description: Whether you have a clear plan or an early idea, we help you define the right next step.
